DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare subjective performance comfilcon A contact lens lotrafilcon B contact lens 4 week reusable lens wear .
DOC.brief_title: Multi-Centre Clinical Evaluation Two Reusable Soft Contact Lenses
DOC.detailed_description: This 80 subject , randomize , bilateral , double-masked , dispense , cross-over study compare comfilcon A versus lotrafilcon B lenses 4 week daily wear lens pair .
DOC.criteria: Spherical distance CL ( Contact Lens ) prescription 1.00 6.00D ( Diopter ) OR eye ( inclusive ) Adapted soft CL wearer ( i.e . > 1 month ) reusable lens wearers* Spectacle cylinder 0.75D eye Correctable 6/9 eye Be 18 34 year age ( inclusive ) Able read , comprehend sign inform consent Own mobile phone able respond SMS survey period 8am 8pm Willing comply wear study visit schedule Any follow render subject ineligible inclusion : Existing wearer daily disposable contact lenses Known allergy OptiFree PureMoist multipurpose solution Any active corneal infection , injury inflammation Systemic ocular allergy , might interfere CL wear Systemic disease , might interfere CL wear Ocular disease , might interfere CL wear Strabismus amblyopia Subjects undergone corneal refractive surgery Subjects keratoconus severe corneal irregularity contraindicate lens wear Pregnant , plan pregnancy lactate Use systemic/topical medication contraindicate CL wear Diabetic Site employee family member investigator Participation concurrent trial last 30 day
